description: From Bernoulli twin numbers to Catalan numbers arrays.Second part.Consider array from companion of Bernoulli twin numbers A172083/A051717 mixed with A051716/A051717 BCT(n)=1,1,-3/2,-1/2,2/3,-1/3,-1/6,-1/6, with successive differences,named BCT1.a(n) are numerators of BCT(n).Denominators (double A051717)=1,1,2,2,3,3,6,6,30,30,30,30,.
